item.description: This is a flag that indicates if the Li-ion battery is low
item.name: Battery Low

item.description: The vehicle is inside a geofence
item.name: Inside Geofence

item.description: The presented driver id was validated OK
item.name: Driver ID Validated

item.description: Temperature sensor 1 is above the set limit
item.name: Temperature 1 High

item.description: Temperature sensor 2 is above the set limit
item.name: Temperature 2 High

item.description: Temperature sensor 3 is above the set limit
item.name: Temperature 3 High

item.description: Temperature sensor 4 is above the set limit
item.name: Temperature 4 High

item.description: Temperature sensor 1 is below the set limit
item.name: Temperature 1 Low

item.description: Temperature sensor 2 is below the set limit
item.name: Temperature 2 Low

item.description: Temperature sensor 3 is below the set limit
item.name: Temperature 3 Low

item.description: Temperature sensor 4 is below the set limit
item.name: Temperature 4 Low

item.description: Temperature sensor 1 is back into the normal range
item.name: Temperature 1 Normal

item.description: Temperature sensor 2 is back into the normal range
item.name: Temperature 2 Normal

item.description: Temperature sensor 3 is back into the normal range
item.name: Temperature 3 Normal

item.description: Temperature sensor 4 is back into the normal range
item.name: Temperature 4 Normal

item.description: The GPS module has a valid position
item.name: Valid GPS Lock

item.description: This flag indicates that the vehicle is disabled. Setting this flag would disable the vehicle if vehicle speed is below the Disable Speed Threshold
item.name: Vehicle Disabled

item.description: This flag indicates that the vehicle is immobilized. Setting this flag would immobilize the vehicle if ignition is not in the ON state
item.name: Vehicle Immobilized

item.description: Geofence Maximum Distance checking is enabled
item.name: Geofence Maximum Distance

item.description: Geofence was visited Out of Sequence
item.name: Geofence Out of Sequence

item.description: Force a flush of all events not currently sent
item.name: Flush Events

item.description: Setting this flag will cause the box to do a Warm Reboot after 10 seconds
item.name: Forced Reset

item.description: Indicate that the MHub should power down
item.name: Power Down

item.description: Indicate if the unit is running in sealed unit mode
item.name: Sealed Unit

item.description: Indicates that the unit was woken because of the tamper switch
item.name: Tamper Wakeup

item.description: Indicate if the voice kit should be on or off
item.name: Voice Kit ON/OFF

item.description: This indicates if the socket is in transparent mode or command mode
item.name: Socket Transparant

item.description: Indicates if a socket is open
item.name: Socket Open

item.description: Indicates that an APN session has been initialised
item.name: APN Registered

item.description: Flag to indicate that the geofence upload has been completed
item.name: Gefence Upload Completed

item.description: Main Voltage below voltage threshold - same as Flag 32
item.name: Mains Voltage Low - Duplicate

item.description: Vehicle stationary as per Trip Stationary threshold
item.name: Vehicle Stationary

item.description: If set Health Status message is raised
item.name: Health Status

item.description: A report has been queued for transmission on the Iridium Module
item.name: Tx Report Queued

item.description: Signal strength is high enough to transceive
item.name: Iridium Satellites in View

item.description: The Iridium module will initiate a session with the GSS asap
item.name: Iridium Session Pending

item.description: A FMS Canbus Poll was requested
item.name: FMS Canbus Poll

item.description: General Warning Flag e.g. Disable Vehicle
item.name: Warning Flag

item.description: Indicates that a voice call is currently active
item.name: Voice Call Active

item.description: Indicates that a data call is active.
item.name: Data Call Active

item.description: Set Flag to Generate Tachograph Event
item.name: Raise Tacho Graph

item.description: Indicate if the Fuel Cap is open or closed
item.name: Fuel Cap

item.description: GPS RTC Regulator Power Down Sequence Required
item.name: Gps Rtc Power Reset

item.description: Request the Facility Status Event to be raised
item.name: Fascility Status Poll

item.description: Set when one or more advertising devices have been detected
item.name: BLE Remote Found

item.description: Set when a remote is connecting or disconnecting
item.name: BLE Remote Connection Processing

item.description: BLE device is in an established connection
item.name: BLE Remote Connected

item.description: A different / new key to the previous key has been detected
item.name: New BLE Remote Found

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 1 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 2 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 3 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 4 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 5 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 6 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 7 Activated

item.description: Input state or button pressed. (If used as a button-pressed indication then this field should be cleared when used.)
item.name: BLE Input 8 Activated

item.description: Device in tracking list come into range
item.name: Device in tracking list come into range

item.description: Device in tracking list gone out of range
item.name: Device in tracking list gone out of range

item.description: Indicates that the GSM Modem has detected that it is being Jammed on its active frequencies.
item.name: GSM Jamming Active

item.description: indicates that GSM jamming has been active for the prescribed minimum time as set in the GSM Jamming Debounce Time parameter
item.name: GSM Jamming Active (Debounced)

item.description: Special flag, used for client specific integrations
item.name: Special

item.description: Indicates that the unit detected fuel theft
item.name: Fuel Theft Detected

item.description: Indicate that the MHub thinks that Ignition will go ON
item.name: Ignition ON Pending

item.description: Indicate that the MHub was wrong about a pending ignition ON
item.name: False Trip

item.description: The current geofence's speed limit is used for over speed checking
item.name: Geofence Speed Limit in Effect

item.description: If TRUE Trigger State is checked by code to determine if capture should occur
item.name: Data Capture Trigger Enabled

item.description: Trigger State is checked by code to determine if capture should occur
item.name: Data Capture Trigger State

item.description: The vehicle is traveling faster than geofence speed warning limit
item.name: Geofence Speed Warning

item.description: Send part of the Journey Log as events
item.name: Send Journey Log

item.description: GSM Edge is available to be used
item.name: GSM Edge Available

item.description: GSM 3G is available to be used
item.name: GSM 3G Available

item.description: Indicates that the profile used for Wifi is active
item.name: PSD Profile Active

item.description: Indicates whether Wifi configuration GUI is enabled
item.name: Wifi GUI Status

item.description: Causes the generation of the Cell Info event if the event is enabled.
item.name: GSM Cell Info Event Trigger

item.description: Flag to trigger the GSM Cell info event to be sent
item.name: GSM Cell Info Trigger

item.description: Vehicle is inside the specified Driver Geofence
item.name: Inside Driver Geofence

item.description: This flag will be set if 1 or more geofences are loaded in the RAM geofence area
item.name: RAM Geofence Defined

item.description: This flag will be set it any of the Geofences in the RAM geofence area were set with the set driver geofence command
item.name: Driver Geofence Defined

item.description: High current drain on outputs with over-current detection
item.name: Output Over-current Detected

item.description: Indicates if the MHub is logged into MProfiler over any channel
item.name: MProfiler Logged in Status

item.description: While true the MHub will try to maintain a connection to the MQTT broker.
item.name: MQTT Connect

item.description: indicates if MQTT is currently connected to the broker
item.name: MQTT Connected
